Description:
Value, Position and Potential
Situated on a large allotment of 662m2 approx. and only 10 minutes from Geelong CBD, Schools, Shops and public transport this well looked after brick home offers a perfect opportunity for investors or first home buyers looking to enter the market place.
- Close to Bellarine Village and Newcomb Central Shopping Centre
- Proximity to a selection of primary and secondary schools
- Walk to sporting grounds and The Gordon - East Geelong campus
- Terrific access to Bellarine Highway and the Surf Coast
- Three substantial bedrooms with build-in robes
- Spacious light filled lounge and a separate family room
- Well equipped timber kitchen with gas cooking
- Reverse cycle air conditioning, gas log fire and ceiling fans
- Large double garage with three-phase power and a workshop
- Wide driveway, secure space for caravan/boat, garden shed
Insights: 45 Melva Crescent, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Opportunity Knocks!
Enter the property market or add to your portfolio with this neat, compact unit. Consisting of 2 bedrooms, both with built in robes, open plan kitchen, dining & living area and central bathroom. Outdoors you will find a private courtyard & backyard and secure single lock up garage. Other features include Gas wall heater and split system heating & cooling to the living area. Close proximity to all amenities including Schools, medical & sporting facilities, public transport, Buckleys Entertainment Centre and only a short drive to both Newcomb shopping centres and the CBD. Currently leased for $280 per week until June 2019, this is a must inspection for the savvy investor.

Description:
Impressive home and development site.
Lovingly restored with an inspired renovation this Edwardian family home is a treasure trove of history and perhaps the last of its kind on a massive 3256m2 allotment. Originally built in 1916 and transformed over the years to its current glorious state this residence is one of the best homes in the area and blends beautifully the classic era with the modern comforts. Internally, the home comprises four bedrooms plus study, quality kitchen, open plan dining area and generous sized living room, two bathrooms, large laundry, separate toilet and a huge undercover entertainment deck to the rear. The home boasts stunning ornate cornices, leadlight feature windows, open fire places with glorious mantles, polished timber floors and high ceilings. The family chef will love the kitchen which includes timber benches, a classic range stove cooker, dishwasher, loads of storage space and a pantry. The dining area also opens onto the rear veranda and undercover private alfresco area overlooking the huge garden. Additionally, the oversized single garages and carport lead into the huge workshop and storage area for all those keepsakes and hobbies or enthusiasts. With vegetable gardens and wine vines and plenty of fruit trees this property is an oasis so close the CBD. The huge development potential to subdivide the property (STCA) into multiple lots zoned General residential Zone -Schedule 1 and keep the beautiful existing property is an opportunity not to be missed. This property truly is one of the best and unique homes in the area and located just 9 mins to Geelong CBD 6 minutes to south Geelong railway station, 2 minute walk to bus services and a short walk to primary and secondary schools, Newcomb shopping centres and Gordon east Geelong campus.
Insights: 4-6 Regent Street, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2019 and 6 other 4 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Great property portfolio starter
You will feel completely secure and feel like you are away from the rest of the world in this cute and cozy two bedroom unit. Extremely well presented with kitchen, meals and living all flowing as one coherent area. The two bedrooms are a generous size with large built in robes you have access to the garage from the rear via back courtyard, which has enough room for a garden which is accessible by back door located in the laundry. This well laid out floorplan offers generous storage, with climate control and ducted heating throughout. Located just a short drive to Geelong CBD and close to all public transport, shops and schools. Rental Estimate $240-250 p/w

Description:
Golden opportunity on its own title!
This neatly presented unit on its own title presents a fantastic opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers and investors. Conveniently located close to the local shopping centre, schools and public transport, this home is surprisingly spacious both inside and out. Featuring two bedrooms with built-in robes and ceilings fans, an open plan living and dining area with split-system heating and A/C, functional kitchen with gas upright oven and large bench space with breakfast bar. A central bathroom with shower and separate bath. Complete with a fully serviced alarm system and remote shutters on bedrooms. Outside there's a single lockup garage, a private and generous size backyard with garden shed. Inspection a must!

Renovated Gem With Potential In Convenient Locale
Occupying approx. 822sqm, this updated home presents a fantastic opportunity for young families, first home buyers, investors and developers alike (STCA). Conveniently positioned an easy walk from local shops, Whittington Primary School and Grinter Reserve.
- Lounge/dining zone flows through to kitchen and family room
- Kitchen with stone benchtops, breakfast bar and s/steel apps
- Master with w/in robe, modern ensuite with open shower
- Two additional beds (one with b/in robes) and Euro laundry
- Contemporary bathroom with frameless shower and bathtub
- Gas wall heater and air conditioner provide comfort
- Generous alfresco offers great potential for outdoor living
- Secure and spacious north-facing backyard with garden shed
- Ample parking with single carport, plus large shed/man cave
- Moments to public transport and a short drive to the CBD
- Currently tenanted until 31st August 2019 at $330 per week

Description:
Hidden gem.
This well located and attractive 2 bedroom unit presents a great opportunity for those seeking a modern low maintenance lifestyle or a stylish investment property. This 2 story townhouse offers 2 generous sized bedrooms, bathroom, w/c and single R/C garage with internal access downstairs and large open plan kitchen/meals/family room upstairs leading out onto the balcony overlooking the park land. The sleek kitchen includes gas hot plates, dishwasher, pantry and complete with split system heating and cooling for year round comfort. Currently leased at $290 per week this is a fantastic opportunity to add to your property portfolio. Located close to Newcomb Shopping Centres, schools and public transport and 10 minutes to Geelong CBD. Whether you're searching for your first home, downsizing or simply looking for your next investment this fantastic opportunity should not be overlooked.

Description:
Large Family Home Embodying Space & Style!
Please contact agent for a private viewing on 0490 816 017
Cleverly designed with 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a huge lounge area, and an open plan living, dining and kitchen, looks can be deceiving with this sizeable surprise.
Ideal for large families, 2 bedrooms are comprised with built-in-robes, the Master room features its own ensuite and walk-in-robe, and the fourth room as a bedroom or study as required.
Entertaining friends and family has never been easier with your very own gorgeous undercover verandah overlooking the massive backyard. Boasting a low maintenance garden in the front and back, there is plenty of room for the kids and pooch to play.
Offering access directly into the rear yard, the double car garage is currently being used as a single car garage and a cool games room.
Situated on a large 650sqm block and in a quiet court, you're in a prime location just minutes away from Westfield Geelong, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, schools, tafes, restaurants and cafes.
Seeing is believing when it comes to the size of this home! Call Suzanna Levic on 0490816017 today!
Features:
4 Bedrooms (3 with Built-in-Robes)
Master Bedroom with Ensuite and Walk-in-Robe
Open plan Living, Dining and Kitchen
Large Lounge room
Huge Laundry
Air-conditioning and Heating
Double Car Garage with access to backyard
Massive undercover Verandah
Large Backyard with Garden Shed
20 Solar Panels

Description:
Perfect Entry into Geelong’s Growing market!
The perfect starting point to enter into Geelong’s forever growing market!
On a substantial 695m2; this well-maintained stand-alone brick home, offers an amazing opportunity to simply enjoy as is, further up-style or possibly redevelop.
Securely nestled in a quiet court, this well presented home meets low maintenance lifestyle priorities with impressive ease.
Relish the opportunity – freshly painted, new flooring throughout - one centrally located bathroom, three-bedroom home, all include built in robes and a spacious light filled family living room. Fully equipped kitchen/Meals area with a new gas oven and cook top that flows effortlessly accessing to the vast rear yard.
Plenty of off-street parking with the large driveway, single carport and single garage.
Located just 4km East of Geelong CBD and the convenience of neighbouring schools within walking distance - Whittington P.S, currently undertaking upgrades with over $6.6 million of State funding for upgrades offering children better education and facilities. Also offering transport at your door step and shops including Newcomb Centro shopping centre, Splashdown, St. Albans football ground as well as plenty of parks and walking tracks close by.
Whether you’re looking to enter into the property market or wanting to start or add to your investment portfolio with an estimated return of $320.00 per week, this property offers impressive options with endless advantages.
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.

Description:
Fantastic Value First Home or Investment
Set on a sprawling allotment of approx. 700m2, this solid brick home is well proportioned and provides comfortable accommodation with spacious surrounds, all in arguably Whittington’s quietest court location.
Whether it be to invest, nest or develop (STCA), the home itself offers a brilliant floorplan and scope to renovate to your own specific preferences. Comprising;
• 3 x generously sized bedrooms, all with BIRs
• Functional central bathroom
• Kitchen features ample cupboard storage and gas cooking
• Timber floors throughout
• Brand new Samsung split system heating/cooling (WiFi control)
• Huge concreted and powered 3-4 car garage ideal for trades people
• Expansive, landscaped yet low maintenance front and rear yard
Convenient access to shopping, schools and transport speaks volumes about the home's versatility as an astute investment or ideal first home.
Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
RELAX IN YOUR OWN QUIET OASIS
This neat 3 bed, 1 bath, 2 toilets, 1 liv, 4 car property ticks all the boxes for down sizers, investors or first home buyers on 720m2 approx. With a world war 2 sea mine as a lovely front yard feature.
The wide entrance with original hardwood flooring is fantastic in size, the large living room offers split system and a flood of natural light.
Further into this great home is the open plan meals which seats up to 6 and original kitchen that has plenty of cupboard and bench space, free standing gas cook top and oven plus Haier brand dishwasher.
The functional laundry is great in size with a large linen cupboard and separate toilet.
Off the hallway is the main bathroom which has your vanity, toilet, corner shower and heat lamps. Further along is your 3 spacious bedrooms all with BIR.
Outside is where you will find your quiet secluded oasis with a huge paved entertaining area, great for BBQ's all year round. The back yard has established gardens and garden shed.
The lock up carport and garage is perfect for 2-3 cars, caravan or trailer.
• $310 Rent per week
• 720m2 approx
• Lock up carport and garage
• Huge undercover pergola
• Garden shed

Description:
Entertainer's Delight!
Nice, neat and nestled in a quiet court, what more could you ask for? The property consists of 4 large bedrooms, master with ensuite & walk-in robe. Open plan kitchen, meals and living area equipped with stainless steel dishwasher, gas cook top, wall oven, walk-in pantry and loads of bench space. Perfect for entertaining family and friends. Large undercover alfresco area complete with built-in BBQ for the summer nights. Other features include separate family/kids' room, ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout the home. Large backyard for the kids to play in, double lock-up garage. Situated on a substantial 734sqm block (approx). Close to Bellarine Peninsula, East Geelong Shopping precinct, schools, 5 minutes from Geelong GBD, Hospitals and Geelong Waterfront. A must inspection.

Description:
A Solid Opportunity on 700m2+
Opportunity has certainly come knocking in the form of a well-appointed solid brick home, boasting over 700m2 in a very convenient court location. With a combination of fantastic foundations, large rooms, sizeable land component all kept in a meticulous manner invites a wealth of possibilities.
A potential fantastic first home, savvy investment or room to improve for those that want to get creative are all possibilities with this value packed home.
Comprising 3 generous sized bedrooms, the master with walk-in robe and ensuite; the remaining 2 with built-in robes. The free-flowing floor plan allows you to set up the living areas and dining space as you please creating a formal dining area or a 2nd sitting area instead. A Large kitchen overlooking the back yard and dining area is equipped with gas stove top, dishwasher and ample cupboard space. The main bathroom, laundry and separate toilet complete this ideal floor plan.
There is an abundance of room to run and play in both the front and back gardens all secured with private gates and fences and kept in a low maintenance condition. The undercover area and garden shed completes the back garden.
Features of the home include split system heating and cooling, single lock up garage and gas cooking.
An all-round fantastic package don't miss an opportunity to reap the benefits.
Insights: 7 Freesia Court, Whittington VIC 3219 was last sold in 2018 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in Whittington have recently been sold.

Description:
Easy Living!
This neatly presented unit presents a fantastic opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers and investors. Conveniently located close to the Newcomb shopping centre, schools and public transport, this home is surprisingly spacious both inside and out. Featuring two bedrooms with built-in robes and ceilings fans, an open plan living and dining area with gas heater and split-system A/C, functional kitchen with gas upright oven and dishwasher, bathroom with shower and separate bath, a fantastic sunroom and enclosed outdoor area which makes for entertaining all year round. Outside there's a single lockup garage, a private and generous size grassed courtyard, garden shed plus side access to an undercover storage space fit for a trailer or motorbike. Call today and arrange a time to inspect!

Description:
Options are a plenty here.
Options are a plenty here. This retro three bedroom home could be a great family home or the perfect investment.
Set on a 686m2 (approx.) allotment this light filled home features three bedrooms, two with built in robes, separate kitchen and dining, spacious living area, bath with overhead shower plus toilet.
With a two car carport plus a two car garage, off street parking, a small shed with separate outdoor toilet and located just a short stroll from the likes of Bellarine Village Shopping Centre, Newcomb Central Shopping Centre, East Geelong Primary School, Gordon Tafe Campus & Geelong Racecourse you definitely should consider this as a new family home or adding this to your property portfolio.
